exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 0 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (a1 : A) (l l1 : list bool), ~ is_prefix l l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l -> pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)

Premises:
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
Inductive pbfree : list bool -> pbtree -> Prop := pbfree_left1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (true :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_left2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbleft b) | pbfree_right1 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree (false :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_right2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (true :: l) (pbright b) | pbfree_node1 : forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbnode b c)
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pbadd = fix pbadd (a : A) (t : pbtree) (l : list bool) {struct l} : pbtree := match l with | [] => pbleaf a | true :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbright (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbright t2 => pbright (pbadd a t2 l1) | pbnode t1 t2 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a t2 l1) end | false :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbleft (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbleft (pbadd a t1 l1) | pb
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive is_prefix : list bool -> list bool -> Prop := prefixNull : forall l : list bool, is_prefix [] l | prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2) Arguments is_prefix (_ _)%list_scope Arguments prefixNull _%list_scope Arguments prefixCons _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
pbadd_prop2 : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (l2 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l2 -> permutation (compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 l2 l1)) ((a1, l1) :: compute_pbcode l2)
is_prefix_sind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> SProp, (forall l : list bool, P [] l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
is_prefix_ind : forall P : list bool -> list bool -> Prop, (forall l : list bool, P [] l) -> (forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> P (b :: l1) (b :: l2)) -> forall l l0 : list bool, is_prefix l l0 -> P l l0
prefixCons : forall (b : bool) (l1 l2 : list bool), is_prefix l1 l2 -> is_prefix (b :: l1) (b :: l2)
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (l1 : list bool), compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a2) l1) = [(a1, l1)]
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
pb_unique_prefix1 : forall (t : pbtree) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) (compute_pbcode t) -> In (a2, lb2) (compute_pbcode t) -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
unique_prefix1 : forall (A : Type) (c : code A) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), unique_prefix c -> In (a1, lb1) c -> In (a2, lb2) c -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
btree_unique_prefix1 : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a1 a2 : A) (lb1 lb2 : list bool), In (a1, lb1) (compute_code t) -> In (a2, lb2) (compute_code t) -> is_prefix lb1 lb2 -> a1 = a2
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = []
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
pbfree_ind : forall P : list bool -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (true :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (false :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbnode b c)) ->...-> P l p
pbfree_sind : forall P : list bool -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (true :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbleft b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), P (false :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (true :: l) (pbright b)) -> (forall (b c : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> P l b -> P (false :: l) (pbnode b c)) ->...-> P l p
encode_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (m1 : list A), ~ In a m1 -> encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) m1 = encode eqA_dec l m1
find_code_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : code A) (l2 : list (A * list bool)), not_null l1 -> find_code eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = match find_code eqA_dec a l1 with | [] => find_code eqA_dec a l2 | b1 :: l3 => b1 :: l3 end
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
pbfree_right2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (true :: l) (pbright b)
pbfree_left2 : forall (b : pbtree) (l : list bool), pbfree l b -> pbfree (false :: l) (pbleft b)
number_of_occurrences_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}

```coq
intros a1 l l1.
intro H1.
intro H2.
destruct H1 as [l2 | l2].
* destruct H2 as [l3 | l3].
  + elimtype False.
    apply H1.
    apply prefixCons.
    assumption.
  + elimtype False.
    apply H2.
    apply prefixCons.
    assumption.
* destruct H2 as [l3 | l3].
  + elimtype False.
    apply H1.
    apply prefixCons.
    assumption.
  + apply pbfree_node1.
    apply pbadd_prop2.
    assumption.
Qed.

original: intros a1 l l1. intro H1. intro H2. destruct H1 as [l2 | l2]. * destruct H2 as [l3 | l3]. + elimtype False. apply H1. apply prefixCons. auto. + elimtype False. apply H2. apply prefixCons. auto. * destruct H2 as [l3 | l3]. + elimtype False. apply H1. apply prefixCons. auto. + apply pbfree_node1. apply pbadd_prop2. auto.
